author: Robb M. Stewart
title: Here’s How You Can Profit From Major Cyberattacks
text:
MELBOURNE, Australia—Cyberattacks are a growing risk for companies, but some investors are trying to turn them into a money making opportunity.
Exchange-traded funds that invest in companies focused on tackling data-security threats are becoming more popular with investors, garnering particular attention whenever there is a high-profile breach.
